name: Funfair Ride Simulator: Techno
description:
NOTE: The new "Funfair Ride Simulator 2" is here! Get it now and you'll get the Techno plus another ride (Hulla Hoop). Search for "Funfair Ride Simulator 2"!

Did you ever control your own carnival funfair ride? Sure not. But now with Funfair Ride Simulator it is possible! In this episode you can control one unique ride on your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad - The "Techno" - One of the most awesome funair rides ever made!

Funfair Ride Simulator is the first and only funfair ride simulation for your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad!

CONTROL
Control your own ride with all possible movements and light controls.

RIDE
"Take your seat and fly!" - Hop on your ride and enjoy the ride in "point of view" sight.

ENJOY
Ejoy your own funfair ride with tons of different light and fog effects.

FEATURES
• Realistic movement and physics
• Fully controllable
• Unique fairground / carnival atmosphere
• light and sound effects
• day / night
• different camera angles including "POV"

Optimized for iPhone 5, iPhone 4(s) and the new iPad.

• • • you love this simulation? take a look at the other simulations at the AppStore! • • •
